name: forgivingly
content:
Add to word list

in a way that shows you forgive someone: Much too forgivingly, his friend helped him until he finally passed out on the couch. John put his arms around her and she responded forgivingly.
More examplesFewer examplesHe just smiles forgivingly at his daughter's bad behaviour.Meanwhile, she said forgivingly: "It has made absolutely no difference to my friendship with you".He took her in his arms and kissed her lovingly, forgivingly."Come on, jump in the car", he said, forgivingly.
